channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Lot Like Christmas
channel.desc: The owner of the most popular Christmas tree lot in Hudson Springs finds her business in jeopardy when a big-city marketing executive arrives with a chain store. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: To Have And To Holiday
channel.desc: Celeste and Jason get engaged and ask her pastor father - who's not ready to let his daughter go - to officiate their Christmas wedding.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas On Call
channel.desc: The lives of various first responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Making Spirits Bright
channel.desc: Two feuding families must find a way to get everyone to work together in order to win a town competition that could save their both their livelihoods. Romantic drama.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Our Holiday Story
channel.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Mistletoe Secret
channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wise Men And A Baby
channel.desc: Three brothers get the surprise of their lives when they are forced to work together to care for a baby over the Christmas holidays.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Merry Ex-Mas
channel.desc: In an awkward turn of events, a man gets snowed in at Christmas with his ex-wife, her wealthy suitor, his former mother in law and his daughter.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Halls On Cherry...
channel.desc: Three generations on Cherry Lane experience life-changing Christmases, from a mistaken address leading to a live TV special, to a family facing their last holiday together.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Finnish Line
channel.desc: Inspired by her father's legacy, Anya enters Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival and her own anxieties.

channel.title: Holiday Touchdown
channel.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone from the Chiefs' front office along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: When Danielle is left to raise her daughter after her husband goes missing and is presumed dead, she begins to tell her daughter bedtime stories of her father.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Holiday Stocking
channel.desc: In Mahogany's first ever Christmas Movie, three estranged sisters are brought back together by a family Christmas tradition - the Holiday Stocking Game.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sugarplummed
channel.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfil it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas In New Hope
channel.desc: An aspiring influencer and mother of a girl living with Down syndrome enters a home improvement competition to save her bungalow before Christmas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: #Xmas
channel.desc: Jen has some tough decisions to make when she gets to the final of a competition with a fake perfect 'family', made up of her, her nephew and her best friend Max.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Season's Greetings From...
channel.desc: Across three different eras, different families occupy a family home, leaving their own festive mark throughout the years despite life's challenges.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Carol For Two
channel.desc: When talented singer Violette takes a job as a waitress in New York, things get complicated when her duet partner sets her up with a friend but starts developing feelings himself.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Tale Of Two Christmases
channel.desc: Emma experiences two different Christmases: one where she stays in town and celebrates with a new crush, and one where she returns home to her family. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Navigating Christmas
channel.desc: Recently divorced Melanie and her son Jason visit a remote island for Christmas, where the curt-but-cute owner of a lighthouse brightens her holiday.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Following Yonder Star
channel.desc: Abby Marshall, once celebrated for her role as an inspirational mother on TV, spends a chaotic Christmas at a remote Vermont retreat. Can her own holiday wishes come true.
